sentences.en: A singer on the country music station was singing a lament for the late, great Buddy Holly.
sentences.cn: 乡村音乐电台中，一位歌手正演唱歌曲哀悼已故的伟大音乐人巴迪·霍利。

sentences.en: an old college buddy of mine
buddied up to the coach in hopes of making the team.
Calm down, buddy [ old chap ] . What's the trouble?
sentences.cn: 压压气, 老兄. 有什么麻烦 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even the other puller was uneasy, but he said with a grin, " Let's go, buddy!
sentences.cn: 光头也看出不妙, 可是还笑着说: “ 招呼吧, 伙计!

sentences.en: For many days now Buddy and Joe had appeared to be more and more tangled up in secrets.
sentences.cn: 这些天巴迪和乔好像变得越来越神神秘秘。

sentences.en: Get out of my way, buddy!
sentences.cn: 别挡道了, 你这家伙!

sentences.en: He knew that Buddy was yearning to be with him, aching to share his confidence.
sentences.cn: 他知道布迪渴望着跟他在一起, 迫切地想当他的心腹.

sentences.en: I'm surprised they're so buddy - buddy.
sentences.cn: 我感到奇怪的是她们俩那么友好.

sentences.en: Research tells us buddy cops live in visually distinctive places.
sentences.cn: 研究表明优秀的警察总是住在与众不同的地方.

sentences.en: Rudolph gave Buddy's loyalty just about three weeks to wear out.
sentences.cn: 鲁道夫估计巴迪的忠诚能坚持三个星期左右.

sentences.en: You start buddy -- buddying with them and they'll get knocked off.
sentences.cn: 你跟他们可亲热不得,一亲热他们就得掉脑袋.

sentences.en: You want to just back out of my personal space there, buddy?
sentences.cn: 你想完全收回我的私人空间, 伙计?

phrases.tran_cn: 逢迎：讨好某人如通过利用友谊

trans.tran_cn: 朋友，同伴，搭档，（称呼不认识的男子）老兄
